alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Lower Yukon Valley; Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 20 at 5:24AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Wintry Mix for the Yukon Delta, and eastern Norton Sound through Monday... Expect a mix of snow, rain, and near blizzard conditions with blowing snow from the Yukon Delta along the eastern Norton Sound Coast. A weather front moving north through the area today will bring 1 to 2 inches of snow. Then as temperatures warm a chance of rain mixing with snow along the coast in the Yukon Delta. Strong east winds developing in Eastern Norton Sound will bring gusts around 50 mph to the coast from Shaktoolik to Unalakleet. Blowing snow will reduce visibility to less than one mile at times and drifting snow may impact travel. Residents should take necessary precautions and prepare for poor traveling conditions. For the latest forecast go to weather.gov/fairbanks.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Lower Yukon Valley; Yukon Delta
